title: 8th Annual Uncorked: A Case for Wine
short_description: The Auxiliary Board's annual wine-tasting event
list_description: The Auxiliary Board's annual wine-tasting event
description:
The Auxiliary Board thanks all the supporters of the 8th annual wine-tasting event. The special evening included a dinner featuring inventive food-and-drink pairings with a wide variety of wines. Silent and live auctions offered behind-the-scenes cultural experiences, a special selection of wines, and unique dining opportunities.

Photos from the event can be viewed on the Auxiliary Board’s Facebook page.
